Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to room type.

All children are welcome. Free! All children under 18 years stay free of charge when using existing beds. Any additional older children or adults are charged USD 10 per night when using existing beds. One older child or adult is charged USD 10 per person per night in an extra bed. Free! One child under 4 years stays free of charge in a crib. The maximum number of extra beds/cribs in a room is 1. Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management. Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
Pets are allowed. Charges may apply.

item.title: Hôtel Alpina
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Offering views of Mont Blanc, this hotel is located in the centre of Chamonix, 950 metres from the Aiguille du Midi cable car. It offers a restaurant, bar and hot tub.
Hôtel Alpina offers rooms facing Le Brévent or Mont Blanc. All rooms feature a TV and a minibar and some offer a balcony.
A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. The Alpina’s restaurant “Le Vista” offers mountain views and serves an all-you-can-eat surf and turf buffet.
In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar and lounge with a fireplace. A billiards room is also available.
The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day and each Saturday staff organise a welcome meeting to familiarise guests with Chamonix and the surrounding area. Excursions can be organised at the hotel.
The property is located just across the road from the bus stop. Guests can take the bus to the Brevent Cable Car and join the Les Flegères slopes, the Les Grand Montets slopes and the Les Houches slopes

item.title: Abc Vacances Discount
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
With direct access to Biscarrosse Lake beach and located a 30-minute drive from Biscarrosse Atlantic Ocean beach, Abc Vacances Discount features an outdoor and an indoor swimming pool. This holiday park also offers free WiFi access in public areas.
Viewing the property garden filled with pine trees, each accommodation is air conditioned and includes a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and a hairdryer.
Guests can have their meals at Abc Vacances Discount restaurant or sip a drink at the bar. Meals can also be prepared in the mobile homes’ fully equipped kitchenette and barbecue facilities are at guests' disposal.
At an extra cost, scuba diving, fishing, water sport activities, table tennis, mini golf, windsurfing, billiards and a tennis court can be enjoyed on site. Bicycles rental is possible and biking roads can be found nearby. Labouheyre Train Station is located 30 km from Abc Vacances Discount.

All children are welcome. Free! All children under 18 years stay free of charge when using existing beds. Any additional older children or adults are charged USD 10 per night when using existing beds. One older child or adult is charged USD 10 per person per night in an extra bed. Free! One child under 4 years stays free of charge in a crib. The maximum number of extra beds/cribs in a room is 1. Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management. Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
Pets are allowed. Charges may apply.

    We’re truely dedicated to make your travel experience as much simple and fun as possible!

    Bringing you a modern, comfortable, and connected travel experience is one of our highest priorities and that’s why we continuously try to improve your experience when you book anything with us.

    We really appreciate and welcome any of suggstions you might have for us, so feel free drop us line anytime.

    [/folded_corner_block]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Tour Colosseum
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[map center="48.85661, 2.35222" markers="48.85661, 2.35222" height="255px" /] [box]

General Information About This Tour

Tales of gladiators, executions, mock sea battles, and the daily life of ancient Romans await you on this fascinating tour of the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill—all without waiting in line. Standing atop the Opium Hill, gaze down at the Roman Colosseum and use this perfect opportunity to grab some great photographs. Your tour begins as you head down to enter the Colosseum, bypassing the notoriously long lines with your small-group tour. Your guide describes the mind-blowing history of the amphitheater and its importance as one of ancient Rome's important social centers. From the Palatine Hill, the most well known of the Seven Hills of Rome, you can admire sweeping panoramic views of the Roman Forum and Nero's Circus Maximus. March along the Via Sacra, or “Sacred Road”—the main street through ancient Rome and the traditional route of Roman Triumph, through to the Roman Forum. End the tour at the temple housing the altar where Julius Caesar was cremated.

Day 01
